content.query:
-- Views for Dimensions

-- Source System Data
CREATE VIEW  LDW.vwTrips
AS
SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET
(BULK 'nyctlc/yellow/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet',  -- Specify the path of the file
DATA_SOURCE='ExternalDataSourceDataLake2',   -- Specify the source you created on top your storage account(datalake)
FORMAT='PARQUET' 
) as result

where result.filepath(1) in ( '2017,2018')
and result.filepath(2) in ( '11','12','13')
